distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for glibc fixes the following issues:

Security issue fixed:

- CVE-2019-9169: Fixed heap-based buffer over-read via an attempted case-insensitive regular-expression match (bsc#1127308).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: In the GNU C Library (aka glibc or libc6) through 2.29, proceed_next_node in posix/regexec.c has a heap-based buffer over-read via an attempted case-insensitive regular-expression match.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
